title: Gomu Gomu no Mi (Rubber Fruit)
description: The legendary Devil Fruit that grants its user the ability to stretch like rubber. Beware of losing the ability to swim forever!

title: Yoru – Dracule Mihawk's Black Blade
description: The supreme-grade black sword wielded by Dracule Mihawk, the World's Strongest Swordsman. Known for its indestructible sharpness.

title: Mera Mera no Mi (Flame Fruit)
description: This rare Devil Fruit grants its user the power to create, control, and become fire. A favorite among fighters who like to turn up the heat!

title: Shusui – Roronoa Zoro's Cursed Sword
description: A legendary cursed sword, formerly wielded by the samurai Ryuma. Grants immense power but can be dangerous to the unworthy.

title: Kairoseki (Sea-Prism Stone) Handcuffs
description: Handcuffs made of Kairoseki to nullify Devil Fruit powers. Essential for any pirate looking to capture a powerful opponent.

title: Hito Hito no Mi (Human-Human Fruit)
description: A unique Devil Fruit that grants the ability to think, feel, and act like a human. Perfect for any animal looking to gain sentience!

title: Clima-Tact – Nami's Weather Staff
description: The ultimate tool for manipulating weather, developed by Usopp. Perfect for causing storms, lightning, or a cool breeze.

title: Yubashiri – Zoro's Trusty Sword
description: One of the 50 skillful-grade swords. Although destroyed, replicas of Yubashiri are still sought by avid swordsmen.

title: Poseidon Ancient Weapon Blueprint
description: The blueprint to the ancient weapon Poseidon, rumored to control the sea kings. Only for the ambitious and daring!

title: Kikoku – Trafalgar Law's Sword
description: A powerful cursed sword wielded by the Surgeon of Death, Trafalgar Law. Its powers make it deadly in the right hands.

title: Kairosuke (Sea Stone) Bullets
description: Bullets made from Kairosuke, perfect for immobilizing Devil Fruit users. Often used by the Marines.

title: Poneglyph Replica Tablet
description: A replica of the ancient Poneglyph tablets. A beautiful collector's item for historians and adventurers alike.

title: Sandai Kitetsu – Zoro's Cursed Sword
description: One of the cursed swords wielded by Zoro. Known to bring misfortune to its user, but incredibly powerful.

title: Dials from Skypiea (Assorted Set)
description: A set of dials with various abilities: Flame Dial, Impact Dial, and Breath Dial. Essential for any adventurer visiting Skypiea.

title: Hana Hana no Mi (Flower Fruit)
description: This Devil Fruit allows the user to sprout additional limbs anywhere, making it perfect for multitasking in combat.

title: Baratie Specialty Seafood Platter
description: A luxurious seafood platter from the Baratie, known for its gourmet cuisine. Perfect for any pirate's last meal before a journey.

title: Demon Bamboo Vergo's Bamboo Staff
description: A durable bamboo staff used by Vergo. A reliable and simple weapon that packs a punch.

title: Usopp's Kabuto Slingshot
description: The unique slingshot crafted by Usopp, allowing for various ammunition types and long-range attacks.

title: Pirate Jolly Roger Flag (Customizable)
description: Show off your crew's spirit with a customizable Jolly Roger flag. Perfect for any ship's mast!

title: Log Pose – Essential Navigational Tool
description: A Log Pose, essential for navigating the Grand Line. Attunes to the island's magnetic field, guiding pirates on their journey.
